title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Ethical Decision-Making and Critical Thinking Micro-Credential for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with business terminology and basic organizational decision-making processes
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify ethical dilemma scenarios with 80% accuracy through business case analysis.
Learners can propose three or more alternatives considering stakeholder impacts when making decisions under uncertainty.
Learners can apply five or more critical thinking strategies (e.g., SWOT analysis, bias review) through mobile-based case simulations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
